attacks.name: Rage
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Dark Flareon.

attacks.name: Playing with Fire
attacks.effect: Use this attack only if there are any Energy cards attached to Dark Flareon. Flip a coin. If heads, discard 1 of those Energy cards and this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage. If tails, this attack does 30 damage.
